full_text: Form G-135 FEB 27 1961 Agency Name Check NR2-28-313 (Rev. 1-15-59) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE 2278 District BUFFALO Immigration and Naturalization Service File No. 10 001 1 331 Sub-office N SERVICE Albany Date Feb. 23, 1961 ALBANY. N. Y. DIRECTOR, FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, 1961 MAR-3 AM 8.48 Washington 25, D.C. Attention: NAME CHECK SECTION, DOMESTIC INTELLIGENCE DIVISION Please furnish any derogatory information contained in any file - other than fingerprint records - which your Bureau may have concerning the following person: NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL LIVIN, Wladimir F. April 23, 1878 M W STATUS PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state PRESENT NATIONALITY S NA Vladivostock, Russidentry) Stateless D W ALIASES (Identify maiden name or nicknames) PARENTS' NAMES (Include present address, if known) - HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS 5-7 163 grey grey fair None RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 22 Forest Drive, Albany, NY 1956 Present PRIOR RESIDENCES, IF AVAILABLE EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS (Employer's name and address) OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION FROM TO NONE PRIOR OCCUPATIONS (Not included in above) SPOUSE (Full name & any other names used, & present address, if not same as above) DATE OF BIRTH May 10, 1890 Anna W. Livin PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or Vladivostockstat Russia) ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) NONE LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports or if numerous, list years PREVIOUS NUMBERS ASSIGNED (Milit. S/N; passport; social security; FBI; etc., FURNISHED This Pertinent is BY the FBISUH to ligation your involving. Conducted when previously in U.S.) NYC, 3/6/56; Perm. Res. identify each) PREVIOUS REPORTS NO YES If, yes Strack list of REASON FOR REQUEST DEPORTATION BENEF. PB #: considered # (Specify) APPLICANT FOR: PROCEEDINGS ADM. TO U.S. ADJ. OF STATUS SPONSOR PB #: FOR RELIEF, OF NATZ RETURN TO: DISTRICT DIRECTOR, (2) U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service 312 Old Post Office Bldg., 12th & Penna. Ave., N.W.
